definition: namely/that is/i.e./prompt/at once/at present/even if/prompted (by the occasion)/to approach/to come into contact/to assume (office)/to draw near
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc

sentences.english: Instant communication is Chinese Internet most one of all-pervading network application.
sentences.chinese: 即時通訊是中國互聯網最爲普及的網絡應用之一。

sentences.english: V / shtml Save all instant messenger passwords into HTML file.
sentences.chinese: 保存所有即時通訊密碼的HTML文件。

sentences.english: I chat with my friend using an instant messanger.
sentences.chinese: 我跟我朋友聊天用即時通訊。

sentences.english: Wasn’t the Xfire service just another IM service?
sentences.chinese: 難道Xfire不只是另外的一種即時通訊服務？

sentences.english: I also quit instant messaging services and I tried to stop text ing.
sentences.chinese: 我還停用了即時通訊服務，而且嘗試停止發短信。

sentences.english: Kelvin and I were chatting on Instant Messenger.
sentences.chinese: 爾文和我聊天的即時通訊軟件。

sentences.english: Tencent Holdings Ltd. overcameMicrosoft Corp. and  Yahoo! Inc . to conquer China’s instant-messaging market.
sentences.chinese: 騰訊打敗了微軟和雅虎，佔領了中國即時通訊市場。

sentences.english: Services such as instant messaging are used, but not by everyone.
sentences.chinese: 即時通訊的功能會被用到，但並不每個人都會用。

sentences.english: I have a MX5 which im currently welding at the moment for the MOT.
sentences.chinese: 我有一個MX5其中即時通訊目前焊接此刻的年檢。

sentences.english: Delete any Instant Messaging programs you've downloaded, as well.
sentences.chinese: 也要將你下載的所有即時通訊工具刪除。

sentences.english: The network instant communication is the internet real-time information exchange.
sentences.chinese: 網絡即時通訊就是網絡上實時進行信息交流。

pinyin: xu1 ni3 zhuan1 yong4 wang3 luo4

definition: toss a peach, get back a plum (idiom); to return a favor/to exchange gifts/Scratch my back, and I'll scratch yours.
